page.title: 17COMMERCE
page.content: The only shop in the area is at Ingram village and that is solely for the tourists who are visiting the information centre.No foods are kept.The valley is well served by travelling shops from various larger centres of population such as Alnwick and Rothbury.The coal merchants come to the area from Shilbottle and Amble.Milk and papers are delivered six times a week (Sunday being the exception).The post is usually delivered during the afternoon with a single collection -also during the afternoon.Many of the locals travel to the shops in Alnwick and the post office in Powburn.Pensions are collected by the postman for elderly residents of the valley.
